name: spatial_coeff
description: used to calculate the scaling parameter

name: rooting_depth_factor
description: proportion of soil thickness used for evapotranspiration

name: macropore_fraction
description: fraction of precipitation that can bypass the unsaturated subsurface zone and move directly into the saturated subsurface zone

name: snowmelt_temperature_cutoff
description: temperature cutoff for snowpack accumulation and snowmelt

name: snowmelt_rate_coeff
description: used to control rate of snow melt

name: snowmelt_rate_coeff_with_rain
description: used to control rate of snow melt when raining

name: pet_calib_coeff
description: pet hamon calibration coefficient (KPEC) initially set to 1.2 for Southeastern United States

name: lake_delay
description: estimated time for water to move through lake

name: eff_imp
description: percentage of impervious area connection to stream network

name: imp_delay
description: estimated delay for impervious runoff to reach stream network

name: twi_adj
description: Adjustment for magnitude of TWI - must be >= 1.

name: grow_trigger
description: Temperature (C) transition to/from growing season for ET Exp and AMC.
